channel.title: CVE Feed for Sensormatic Electronics, a subsidiary of Johnson Controls, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sensormatic Electronics, a subsidiary of Johnson Controls, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-0248|2024-08-02T05:02:44.139Z -- sensormatic%20electronics%2C%20a%20subsidiary%20of%20johnson%20controls%2C%20inc. -- iosmart%20gen1
item.description: An attacker with physical access to the Kantech Gen1 ioSmart card reader with firmware version prior to 1.07.02 in certain circumstances can recover the reader's communication memory between the card and reader.

item.title: CVE-2023-3749|2024-08-02T07:01:57.633Z -- sensormatic%20electronics%2C%20a%20subsidiary%20of%20johnson%20controls%2C%20inc. -- videoedge
item.description: A local user could edit the VideoEdge configuration file and interfere with VideoEdge operation.

item.title: CVE-2023-0954|2024-08-02T05:32:46.221Z -- sensormatic%20electronics%2C%20a%20subsidiary%20of%20johnson%20controls%2C%20inc. -- illustra%20pro%20gen%204%20dome
item.description: A debug feature in Sensormatic Electronics Illustra Pro Gen 4 Dome and PTZ cameras allows a user to compromise credentials after a long period of sustained attack.

item.title: CVE-2023-3127|2024-08-02T06:48:07.288Z -- sensormatic%20electronics%2C%20a%20subsidiary%20of%20johnson%20controls%2C%20inc. -- istar%20ultra
item.description: An unauthenticated user could log into iSTAR Ultra, iSTAR Ultra LT, iSTAR Ultra G2, and iSTAR Edge G2 with administrator rights.
